item.title: Lisa add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Why do people have to be this lonely? What's the point of it all? Millions of people in this world, all of them yearning, looking to others to satisfy them, yet isolating themselves. Why? Was the earth put here just to nourish human loneliness?" -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "The most important thing we learn at school is the fact that the most important things can't be learned at school." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Frank O'Hara
item.description: "Now I am quietly waiting for the catastrophe of my personality to seem beautiful again, and interesting, and modern." -- Frank O'Hara

item.title: Lisa add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "Books don't offer real escape, but they can stop a mind scratching itself raw." -- David Mitchell

item.title: Lisa add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "We looked at each other for the last time; nothing is as eloquent as nothing." -- David Mitchell

item.title: Lisa add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I am in fact a hobbit (in all but size). I like gardens, trees and unmechanized farmlands; I smoke a pipe, and like good plain food (unrefrigerated)." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Eileen Myles
item.description: "Listen, I have been educated. I have learned about Western Civilization. Do you know What the message of Western Civilization is? I am alone." -- Eileen Myles

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Melissa Bank
item.description: "We are all children until our fathers die." -- Melissa Bank

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "One day you will do things for me that you hate. That is what it means to be family." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Michelle Tea
item.description: "You try to be good, to be good and loving and nice and not hard, not tough, a sweet nice girl, not ugly, not full of ugliness, but people make it impossible." -- Michelle Tea

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Michelle Tea
item.description: "Maybe if everyone walked around being in touch with each other's hidden pain it could work out and even be beautiful, but it doesn't feel safe to be the only compassionate person on the planet." -- Michelle Tea

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Michelle Tea
item.description: "I will meet you in the dirtiest city you can dream of. We will drink cocktails so sweet they pucker our cheeks, as we perch on cracked leather bar stools. I will buy you plates of calcium and protein and we will run through the streets in excellent danger. " -- Michelle Tea
